body:
There are several advantages to doing this in therapist:
- It integrates into CI
- It allows you to lint only the files you are changing
- It allows you to lint all the files included in the project (but not all the files in `node_modules` etc.)
- It keeps our linting consistent
body_html:
There are several advantages to doing this in therapist:

  • It integrates into CI
  • It allows you to lint only the files you are changing
  • It allows you to lint all the files included in the project (but not all the files in node_modules etc.)
  • It keeps our linting consistent
